item.title: Jamie add a quote by Pamela Redmond Satran
item.description: "Every woman should have a youth she's content to leave behind and a past juicy enough that she's looking forward to telling it in her old age" -- Pamela Redmond Satran

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don’t make money your goal. Instead pursue the things you love doing and then do them so well that people can’t take their eyes off of you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "A Woman in harmony with her spirit is like a river flowing. She goes where she will without pretense and arrives at her destination prepared to be herself and only herself " -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Nothing will work unless you do." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "I think we are well advised to keep on nodding terms with the people we used to be, whether we find them attractive company or not. Otherwise they turn up unannounced and surprise us, come hammering on the mind's door at 4 a.m. of a bad night and demand to know who deserted them, who betrayed them, who is going to make amends." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Paul Valery
item.description: "Poems are never finished - just abandoned" -- Paul Valery

item.title: Jamie add a quote by William J.H. Boetcker
item.description: "You cannot help the poor by destroying the rich. You cannot strengthen the weak by weakening the strong. You cannot bring about prosperity by discouraging thrift. You cannot lift the wage earner up by pulling the wage payer down. You cannot further the brotherhood of man by inciting class hatred. You cannot build character and courage by taking away men's initiative and independence. You cannot help men permanently by doing for them, what they could and should do for themselves." -- William J.H. Boetcker

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Katrina Gutleben
item.description: "Learning can only happen when a child is interested. If he’s not interested it’s like throwing marshmallows at his head and calling it eating." -- Katrina Gutleben
